fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: We mainly follow regulations that concern the financial market such as AML, GDPR, IFRS9, EU Interchange Fee Regulation and Payment System Directive.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
SEB Kort Bank AB, a fully owned subsidiary of SEB Group, is a leading Nordic financial services company in corporate cards and payment solutions. We have approximately 650 employees and operate in Finland, Sweden, Denmark, and Norway. In addition to our own card brands, we also focus on co-branding with many renowned partners. 
 
Furthermore, SEB Kort is a leading provider of solutions for travel administration in the Nordic countries. Companies can utilize our tailored solutions in developing their processes and cutting costs. We grant our own cards in most European countries and, through our global partner network of international financial operators and card issuers, we serve our clients with corporate cards and travel account solutions worldwide.
